pages.text: Werewolves were humans who were cursed, or blessed depending on how you look at it, by the demonic Lord of the Hunt, to serve as both his game and his hounds. Werewolves lurk in forests on full moons, hunting for the flesh of men and animals to consume.

Their eyes glow with the same embers the eyes of demons glow with, and they are more beast than man, and many have forgotten their previous life as a human. Many have claimed its possible to turn into these monsters after getting attacked, but so far there have been no cases, as Werewolves tend to not leave anything left...
